ygData.subject: RE: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: Bann, just a curious question here. Do you work for Verant? Cause you surely defend every last thing they do. NO class should ever be made weaker, Verant is
ygData.messageBody:
Bann, just a curious question here. Do you work for Verant?
Cause you surely defend every last thing they do.

NO class should ever be made weaker, Verant is digging their own grave by
nerfing any class, if Verant needs to tweak for balance then they should add
to a classes skills not take away.

Bree Wyndsdale



>From: Ralph Carothers <CarothersR@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Rez changed
>Date: Fri, 24 Sep 1999 11:20:22 -0400
>
>Plane of Fear = fixed. (3 seperate lands have been in there since it has
>been re-tweaked)
>
>Rogues....I think alot of their problems HAVE been fixed....except a few
>things like failing poison if moving.....
>
>And some classes need to be made weaker to balance the game....then
>again...some also need to be made stronger to balance as well....
>
>
>Bann
>
